**What country or episode are you proposing?**

Please describe the country, year, and fiscal consolidation episode you would like to add, including any known sources.

**Why is this important?**

Explain why this episode or feature would be a valuable addition to the dataset or documentation.

**Additional context**

Provide any links, references, or context that will help us understand and verify the proposed addition.
